title: Feature flags When I clicked feature flags option on my Google Pixel 2 XL, IDK what to do next !
content: I want to know what does the feature flags on Android Pie does, when I clicked it a few options came up and I had no idea what they do and if they are good for me or not. The feature flags option is in the developer options. Thanks for helping.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
